title: Assign Training for a New SOP
description: Following the approval of a new manufacturing SOP, a training coordinator must assign and track training for all affected personnel.

tasks.description: Identify the new SOP and the job roles that are required to be trained on it.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the SOP and the target audience (e.g., 'All Manufacturing Operators').

tasks.description: Create a new training curriculum in the Learning Management System (LMS).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a new curriculum containing the SOP document and a quiz.

tasks.description: Assign the new curriculum to all employees in the target job roles.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully assigns the training to the correct group of employees.

tasks.description: Monitor the training completion rates and send reminders to employees with overdue training.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a completion report and sends automated reminders.
